entry.title: Hello, octopress! Hello, github blog!
entry.content:
I’ll try to post an article through the octopress to github from today.

I wrestled with JavaScript and node.js, and also touched on a variety of other languages, here about six months. However, I did not leave anything as a record, I decided to start recording, even little by little, something did, something struggled(has been struggle), and something to try.

I chose the github for log, because I think it is the best warehouse for development projects, and I think whether it is reasonable to place a blog near it.

I think most of the records are for myself, but I want to be able to leave the articles for someone’s help.

(and I try to write in English)
